note:
Hi, I'm Aaron Parecki,  co-founder of
IndieWebCamp.
I maintain oauth.net, write and consult about OAuth, and
am the editor of several W3C specifications. I help people learn about video production and livestreaming and dabble in product design.

I've been tracking my location since 2008 and I wrote 100 songs in 100 days.
I've spoken at conferences around the world about
owning your data,
OAuth,
quantified self,
and explained why R is a vowel. Read more.
name: Aaron Parecki

content.html: Turns out if you buy someone an @AlaskaAir flight with your airline miles, it gets added to your own Alaska account, and then you get push notifications when their flight starts boarding and have a mild panic because you thought you were supposed to be at the airport
content.value: Turns out if you buy someone an @AlaskaAir flight with your airline miles, it gets added to your own Alaska account, and then you get push notifications when their flight starts boarding and have a mild panic because you thought you were supposed to be at the airport

content.html:
Just published a new version of OAuth 2.0 for Browser-Based Apps!

https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-ietf-oauth-browser-based-apps-11.html

If you have feelings about tokens in browsers, please feel free to chime in on the discussion! You can comment on the mailing list or open issues on the GitHub repo linked from the doc!
content.value: Just published a new version of OAuth 2.0 for Browser-Based Apps!   https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-ietf-oauth-browser-based-apps-11.html  If you have feelings about tokens in browsers, please feel free to chime in on the discussion! You can comment on the mailing list or open issues on the GitHub repo linked from the doc!

content.html:
The list of supported SD cards for the Hyperdeck recorders was updated recently, and there are only 3 SD card brands on the list now 😬

The good news is the ProGrade V90 cards are on that list, and they just went on sale for 15% off!

https://geni.us/Jorc

content.html: As I'm sure comes at no surprise, given the deadline is next week, the FAA is delaying the enforcement of Remote ID for another 3 months to give drone manufacturers more time to figure things out. https://twitter.com/faadronezone/status/1567651060378107904

content.html:
Sometimes I get annoyed that it takes me 10 hours to make a video that takes you 10 minutes to watch.

So my goal with every video is that it gets at least as much total watch time as it took me to make it, then it's worth it.
content.value: Sometimes I get annoyed that it takes me 10 hours to make a video that takes you 10 minutes to watch.  So my goal with every video is that it gets at least as much total watch time as it took me to make it, then it's worth it.

content.html: I just spent 4 hours downloading and organizing files off of 6 different SD cards with footage from the last year. How did I let it go this long??
content.value: I just spent 4 hours downloading and organizing files off of 6 different SD cards with footage from the last year. How did I let it go this long??

content.html:
Dear Brands™

If you work with a PR agency for your outreach to creators, *please* give them an email address at your company domain, otherwise when I get an email "on behalf of X brand" I have no way of verifying this is legitimate, and this is exactly how channels get hacked.
content.value: Dear Brands™  If you work with a PR agency for your outreach to creators, *please* give them an email address at your company domain, otherwise when I get an email "on behalf of X brand" I have no way of verifying this is legitimate, and this is exactly how channels get hacked.

content.html: well I did my (very small) part and migrated my two websites off of Cloudflare today. I'm sure my origin server can handle the extra 26gb/mo of traffic itself just fine.
content.value: well I did my (very small) part and migrated my two websites off of Cloudflare today. I'm sure my origin server can handle the extra 26gb/mo of traffic itself just fine.

content.html:
So... how long until I can train an AI model with a bunch of talking head videos of myself and then type out a script and have it generate a video of me speaking? Seems like we're not that far off.

Sure would speed up the process of filming all this course content.
content.value: So... how long until I can train an AI model with a bunch of talking head videos of myself and then type out a script and have it generate a video of me speaking? Seems like we're not that far off.  Sure would speed up the process of filming all this course content.

content.html:
I just updated my PHP emoji detector library to Emoji 14.0! Better late than never! My new favorites:

🫠 Melting Face (how I feel when it is continuously this hot in Portland)
🪫 Low Battery (me after a long day of travel)

https://github.com/aaronpk/emoji-detector-php
